format: My github was created july 2021.
At the time, among other things, i was interested in cli apps and CommandDotNet cli lib.
Couple of cli apps where produced.
Code that i would reuse in them or one i wanted to learn in separete assembly,
was ending up in it's separete repos, solutions and projects.
These libs were build by generated scripts and
referenced in projs with absolute paths to dlls.
Beggining 2023 i consolidated these libs in one repo and solution.
Net6.0 was upgraded to Net7.0
Replacing paths, Loacal Nugets were generated.
History
I think this was added becouse cli app didnt had json config build in.
Beggining 2022 net. web apps had json config files set in di container by default.
Cli did not. So i readed hastly some msdocs about that.
Once json config was set and used in test app
i begun to use this lib in my cli apps
At 02.2023 my apps were still using it.
Config.Wrapper.Tests proj
ConfigFileTests - abstract class
constants with paths, methods for test api of config
integration test
checks file ok, no file, bad file
ConfigBuilderTests - xunit test class
tests required dependencies, ArgumentNullException on nulls
tests FileNotFoundException
tests ok scenario when ok file is there
ConfigReaderTests - xunit test class
tests required dependencies, ArgumentNullException on nulls
test when json config has bad format, not machting model class (InvalidOperationException)
test if ok file is readed as expected with correct values ending in memory
Config.Wrapper - library
setup and use of .net json config system in cli app
ConfigBuilder class
configures config sys based on msdocs
sets base dir, sets two json files, one optional
sets environmentalVariables
(nice chaining of config methods)
ConfigReader class
reads json object to .net class, two methods for two ways of doing that (possible null return and not null with default obj)
ConfigTool static class
static class tool wrapper for .net json config
DirectorySys class
wrapper to make file sys testable
ConfigSuite class
this is a set of modules witch only has one
todo: investigate why, can't change used in apps
AppConfigSet class
Unity container module registering this lib
there is one instance of config per app, kind of setup
there is also class for MDI container
Unity is now deprecated
Config.Wrapper.CLI.TestApp - cli test app
using lib in test app for example
tests json with string, int, bool
TestSettings - model class
builds config with clasic new keyword and tests redead values
